level.heading: Pre-admission medication management assessment.
level.text: Within 30 days prior to admission, the ALR shall consult with the prospective resident's healthcare practitioner regarding:
The prospective resident's current medication profile, including a review of nonprescription drugs;
Common expected or unexpected side effects; and
The potential that such medications have to act as chemical restraints.
